text: We ’ ve all seen those keyboard warriors who troll accounts on social media looking for a place to spew their negativity and venom, casting judgment on those who have a different opinion or that they think they are superior to. And as quickly as the target of their hate fires back, they vanish, deleting their comments as others smack them down in defense of the person they initially criticized. The typical victims of these cowards are those who are living their best life. Celebrities, entertainers, high profile athletes and, of course, their spouses are easy targets because of their social media presence. But we ’ ve seen it before.
